data.title: Journal Articles – Page 14 – Journal of Liberal History
data.text:
Journal Articles

Letters to the Editor

Nelia Penman (Graeme Peters); Lloyd George and Nonconformity (Kenneth O. Morgan); French elections (Ian Stuart); The 2017 election (Trevor Jones and Richard Pealling).

97 Letters

Liberals in Local Government 1967–2017

Report of Liberal Democrat History Group fringe meeting, Bournemouth, 17 September 2017, with Kath Pinnock, Tony Greaves, Richard Kemp, Sarah Bedford, Matt Cole and Ruth Dombey; chair: Andrew Stunell.

97 Report Oliver Liberals in Local Government 1967-2017

Liberal archives at Flintshire Record Office

List of the archival collections of interest to students of the Liberal Party held at the Flintshire County Record Office.

97 Jones Liberal archives at Flintshire Record Office Hawarden

Domesticity and the New Liberalism in the Edwardian press

Analysis of how the Liberal government’s introduction of labour exchanges and maternity benefits was viewed in the press.

97 Stoddart Domesticity and the New Liberalism

Lord Geraint of Ponterwyd

Biography of Geraint Howells.

97 Jones Lord Geraint of Ponterwyd

The Forbidden Ground

Examination of Gladstone’s role in the introduction and abolition of the Contagious Diseases Acts.

97 Little Forbidden Ground

Liberal history news

Obituary of Bill Pitt; events at Gladstone’s Library.

97 Liberal history news

Agents at work

Review of Kathryn Rix, Parties, Agents and Electoral Culture in England 1880–1910 (Boydell Press, 2016).

96 Review Hawkins Rix Parties Agents and Electoral Culture

Fascinating diary entries of a Liberal junior minister in the thick of events

Review of Andrew Thorpe and Richard Toye (eds.), Parliament and Politics in the Age of Asquith and Lloyd George: the Diaries of Cecil Harmsworth, MP, 1909–1922, Camden Fifth Series, Volume 50 (Cambridge University Press, 2016).

96 Review Jones Thorpe Toye Parliament and Politics in the Age of Asquith and Lloyd George

Margot in wartime

Review of Anne de Courcy, Margot at War: Love and Betrayal in Downing Street, 1912–1916 (Weidenfeld and Nicolson, 2015).

96 Review Dutton de Courcy Margot at War

The leadership of Charles Kennedy

Evening meeting of the Liberal Democrat History Group, 3 July 2017 with Greg Hurst and Lord Newby; chair: Baroness Lindsay Northover.

96 Report Stockley Leadership of Charles Kennedy

The same but different: Lib Dem members in 1999 and 2015

The characteristics of Liberal Democrat members analysed.

96 Bale Poletti Webb The same but different

En Marche! A new dawn for European liberalism?

An examination of the political background to Emmanuel Macron’s election as French President.

96 Steed En Marche

Letters to the Editor

The 1915 general election (Graem Peters, Peter Rowland); Chris Rennard interview (Barry Standen, Roger Jenking).

96 Letters

The Nonconformist mind of Lloyd George

The roots of Lloyd George’s political beliefs.

96 Wrigley Nonconformist mind of David Lloyd George

The 2017 election: a missed opportunity?

An examination of the Liberal Democrat performance in the 2017 election.

96 Curtice 2017 election missed opportunity

Liberal Democrat leadership

Comparative table of leadership performance updated to 2017.

96 Liberal Democrat leadership

Old heroes for a new leader

Vince Cable explains why Roy Jenkins is his political hero.

96 Cable Old heroes for a new leader

Liberal History News

Directory of election candidates; in memory of Sandy Waugh.

96 Liberal history news
